question: Which organisation releases the ‘Global Investment Trends Monitor’ report?
explanation:
United Nations’ Trade and investment body, UNCTAD releases Global Investment Trends Monitor report.
As per the recent edition of the report, global foreign direct investment (FDI) flows fell 49% in the first half of 2020 compared to 2019. This sharp decline is due to the economic crisis from COVID-19. As per the report, developed economies saw the biggest fall in FDI.
